mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.PRIORITY, A.DESCRIPTION, A.USE_YN, B.VIEW_LIST_LEVEL, B.VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL, B.WRITE_LEVEL, B.WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL FROM IMB_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMB_BOARD_AUTH B ON A.ID = B.BOARD_ID ORDER BY A.PRIORITY

SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.PRIORITY, A.DESCRIPTION, A.USE_YN, B.VIEW_LIST_LEVEL, B.VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL, B.WRITE_LEVEL, B.WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL FROM IMB_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMB_BOARD_AUTH B ON A.ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.PRIORITY, A.DESCRIPTION, A.USE_YN, B.VIEW_LIST_LEVEL, B.VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL, B.WRITE_LEVEL, B.WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL FROM IMB_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN IMB_BOARD_AUTH B ON A.ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE A.NAME = #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT IMB_BOARD (ID, NAME, PRIORITY, DESCRIPTION, USE_YN) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{priority}, #{description}, #{useYn} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IMB_BOARD SET NAME = #{name}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, PRIORITY = #{priority}, USE_YN = #{useYn} WHERE ID = #{id}
